description: Terminal-first static homepage for saw.dev with a boot animation, command-driven navigation, accessible interactions, and project detail panels.
why: A personal dev playground that doubles as a lightweight portfolio and experiment board.

description: PowerShell toolkit for locking down and managing Windows kiosk mode environments with repeatable setup and policy automation.
why: Built to make kiosk deployments predictable, secure, and easier to troubleshoot.

description: Dev container setup for building and testing PICO-8 projects with consistent local tooling and reproducible environments.
why: Eliminates machine-specific setup drift for tiny game projects and experiments.

description: Experimental sandbox repo for playful prototypes and rapid idea spikes.
why: A low-pressure space to try weird ideas quickly before formalizing them.

description: TypeScript project for spotting and tracking license plates with a workflow optimized for quick checks and iteration.
why: Created to explore lightweight computer-vision-adjacent tooling and practical data workflows.

description: Go service that streams Minecraft server metrics in near real time for monitoring player activity and server health.
why: Gives fast operational visibility into gameplay and performance without heavy infrastructure.

description: Outlook add-in that validates recipient patterns before send, detecting suspicious domain combinations and lookalike contacts.
why: Reduces high-impact email mistakes with pre-send safety checks.
